title: Discs Watch Face
summary: Bold & non-traditional design to go with your those colourful outfits, everyday!
description: Bold & non-traditional design to go with your those colourful outfits, everyday! Comes with a Quick Glance mode which displays digital time, date, steps & unread notifications counter as well as lets you switch colours on the go.Compatible with all Android Wear watches.
descriptionHTML:
Bold & non-traditional design to go with your those colourful outfits, everyday!

Comes with a Quick Glance mode which displays digital time, date, steps & unread notifications counter as well as lets you switch colours on the go.

Compatible with all Android Wear watches.
comments: Realy nice, interesting, easy to change colours
Nice Idea Looks damn good! Might take some getting used to though
Fashion meets Timepiece Tech design, Easy to customise, and amazing colours to rock with apparelsüëç loved it!  #fashiongeeks this is what you need ‚úî
Absolutely useful The watch face looks really unique and i love the colours. Must download!üëç
Something different! I like how I can change colours so quickly.
recentChanges: 1. Ticks are now coloured in ambient mode!
2. Ambient mode optimised for performance and battery.
